meanings.definition: A sugar alcohol containing a cyclic structure.
meanings.sent1: The cyclitol was used as a sweetener in the candy.
meanings.sent2: She added cyclitol to her baking to make it sugar-free.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf sprinkled cyclitol instead of sugar in the cookie dough.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as cyclitol on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The cyclitol molecule danced in the solution, forming a perfect ring.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of cyclic polyhydric alcohols.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of cyclitols in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Cyclitols are commonly found in plants and fruits.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome watered the flowers with a magical potion made of cyclitols.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was a complex mix, like a bouquet of cyclitols.
meanings.sent5: The cyclitols in the solution formed a beautiful pattern under the microscope.
